priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire WPAI-GH Version 2 Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C166186

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire WPAI-GH Version 2 Test Code Terminology

definition: The Work Productivity and Activity Impairment - General Health Version 2.0 test code.
name: The Work Productivity and Activity Impairment - General Health Version 2.0 Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire WPAI-GH Version 2 Test Code Terminology
synonyms: The Work Productivity and Activity Impairment - General Health Version 2.0 Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - Are you currently employed (working for pay)?
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of your health problems?
terms.preferredTerm: WPAI-GH Version 2 - Hours Miss Work Health Problems

terms.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you miss from work because of any other reason, such as vacation, holidays, time off to participate in this study?
terms.preferredTerm: WPAI-GH Version 2 - Hours Miss Work Other Reason

terms.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - During the past seven days, how many hours did you actually work?
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - During the past seven days, how much did your health problems affect your productivity while you were working?

Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - During the past seven days, how much did your health problems affect your ability to do your regular daily activities, other than work at a job?
terms.preferredTerm: WPAI-GH Version 2 - Problems Affect Daily Activities

terms.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - Absenteeism score.
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - Presenteeism score.
Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - Work productivity loss score.
terms.preferredTerm: WPAI-GH Version 2 - Work Productivity Loss Score

terms.definition: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire - General Health V2.0 - Activity impairment score.
